credit_line: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
title: "Fashion in Flight" Poster
provenance: Marion Dorn Kauffer, 40 Central Park South, New York, NY
medium: Screen print on tan wove paper
description: Flattened, semi-abstracted head of a woman in left profile. She wears a chartreuse winged helmet with star-studded visor. Text, in red, chartreuse, and blue-gray, at top: "fashions / IN FLIGHT"; in lower section:"VIA / AMERICAN / AIRLINES / flagship"; in small letters below image:"E. McKnight Kauffer".
name: Poster
